attributes.additional_details: I honestly find it insane that the government expects someone to live of £94.25 per week when someone could be earning working 40 hours a week earning £372 inline with the living wage then they could see their wage cut by almost £280 a week!
attributes.background: Increase Statutory Sick Pay to be inline with the cost of living

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302277

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
